description: Thanks for using greatbot, for each command please use the prefix '!'.

commands.title: reddit
commands.description: Grabs a hot post from the given subreddit.

commands.title: vc/dc
commands.description: Encrypt/decrypt plaintext/ciphertext using a Vigenere cipher with a given key.

commands.title: rps
commands.description: Play rock paper scissors with the bot.

commands.title: prnt
commands.description: Grabs a screenshot from a random prnt.sc url.
